name: COVID 2020 Olympics
description:
Since Covid-19  forced the delay of the Tokyo 2020 Olympic Games to 2021, we've created this series of alternative competition events the celebrate the Corona virus.

In this WarioWare-inspired collection of mini-games, you must do your best to commit health  and safety violation and spread the disease to as many people as you can.

Controls:

Played using only mouse movement and the left mouse button.

Created in one week as an entry for the Weekly Game Jam 151 with the theme "Olympic Games".
